page.title: 13Youth and Community Centre.
page.content:
The new Youth and Community Centre adjoining the school is used by clubs and private parties. Most birthday parties have an entertainer or a disco. Each week, Playgroup has 7 sessions and the Youth Club 2. Average numbers of people using the Centre each week (* = 2 people):
{SCRABBLE}.........***** {BABY CLINIC}......***** {MOTHER & TODDLER}.***** ***** {BROWNIES}.........***** ***** **** {KEEP FIT}.........***** ***** ***** {YOUTH CLUB}.......***** ***** ***** { }***** ***** ***** ***** ***** {PLAYGROUP}........***** ***** ***** ***** ***** ***** ***** ***** ** {PARTIES/DISCOS}...***** ***** ***** ***** ***** ***** ***** ***** *****
